application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

ART4 Name: New Malden District Centre Inset Area
NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Details required by Condition 3 (Facing materials), Condition 4 (Openings/Windows), Condition 7 (Landscaping and Planting Scheme), Condition 8 (Construction Management Plan), Condition 9 (Refuse and Recycling), Condition 10 (Secure Cycle Facilities), Condition 12 (Protection from Railway Noise), Condition 13 (Environmental Construction Management Plan) and Condition 14 (Contaminated Land Assessment) of Planning Permission 17/14193/FUL (Change of use of site from car sales to residential use. Erection of part single/ part two/ part three storey building for use as nine self-contained flats with roof terraces/ amenity space and cycle parking provision)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted for Conditions 3 (Materials). The applicant has not adequately demonstrated that the development would achieve a satisfactory appearance on completion. The proposal would not comply with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Insufficient information has been submitted for Conditions 10 (Cycle Facilities). The applicant has not demonstrated that the development would be carried out / delivered in a way that would take account of highway safety concerns. The details are therefore in conflict with Policy DM8 (Sustainable Transport for New Development) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
